name: ToiletDiaries Memory (beta)
description:
BETA Testing (computer version, final version will be on mobile)

A photo Memory game from *The Toilet Diaries photo series. Its play's like the classical memory game but then with two half's of one photo and bad jokes.

Every game you can unlock new pictures in the Photo Gallery until you have collected the whole series. And unlock never seen before variations of some of the pictures, unlocking even more silliness in the PhotoGallery. Or save your own creations by mixing two photo's together. (not all pictures are in the beta yet)

Coming Updates

  • jokes where-ever there is text

All feedback is welcome!

*The toilet Diaries is a comedic photo series of 60+ funny photo's from 2 guys on the toilet. Made by Marc & Gerben from Ducktape studios.
